---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(skimr)
```

## Read in the data

```{r}
toolik_chlorophyll <-
  read_csv(here::here("data",
                      "data-raw",
                      "toolik_chlorophyll.csv"), na = c(".")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

## 

```{r}
skim(toolik_chlorophyll)
```

```{r}
chlorophyll_pprod_graph <- ggplot(data = toolik_chlorophyll,
                                  aes(x = active_chl_a_ug_l,
                                      y = pprod_mg_available_c_m3_d)) +
  geom_point()
chlorophyll_pprod_graph
```

```{r}
ggsave(plot = chlorophyll_pprod_graph, here::here("figs", "my_awesome_graph.jpg"),
       width = 8,
       height = 8,
       dpi =200)
```
